data.comment: The first-half is under way at Turf Moor - Brighton kick-off to start the match.
Throw-in Burnley.
In the minute 1, Jon Moss awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Burnley.
Throw-in for Brighton at Turf Moor.
In the minute 3, Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
Burnley to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
At Turf Moor, Josh Brownhill has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 6, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Burnley are whistled for offside.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a Burnley throw-in in Brighton's half.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 11, Play has been interrupted briefly in Burnley to check on Phil Bardsley, who is grimacing with pain.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Brighton at Turf Moor.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Brighton take a 0-1 lead thanks to Yves Bissouma.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Brighton.
In Burnley Brighton attack through Aaron Connolly. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Burnley.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Brighton needs to be cautious. Burnley have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 30, Jon Moss awards Brighton a goal kick.
Jon Moss signals a Brighton throw-in in Burnley's half.
Brighton have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Jon Moss awards Burnley a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 41, Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brighton are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Brighton.
Chris Wood gets an equalizer for Burnley. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 44, That's a fine assist from Erik Pieters.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Throw-in high up the field for Burnley in Burnley.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
In the minute 45, Burnley to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Burnley.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Burnley kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Brighton.
Throw-in Burnley.
In the minute 49, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Aaron Connolly gives Brighton a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 50, Neal Maupay with an assist there.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jon Moss waits before resuming play because Erik Pieters for Burnley is still down.
In the minute 56, Brighton are coming forward and Alexis MacAllister gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Burnley drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Burnley.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Burnley's Jay Rodriguez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Brighton have a goal kick.
Free kick Burnley.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Burnley.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 66, Burnley have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Throw-in for Brighton at Turf Moor.
In Burnley, Burnley push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Burnley.
Burnley's Jay Rodriguez misses with an attempt on goal.
Brighton have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
Graham Potter is making the team's first substitution at Turf Moor with Aaron Mooy replacing Yves Bissouma.
Graham Potter (Brighton) is making a second substitution, with Davy Propper replacing Alexis MacAllister.
In the minute 74, Bernardo is replacing Solly March for Brighton at Turf Moor.
The home team replace Johann Gudmundsson with Robbie Brady.
Jon Moss awards Brighton a goal kick.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Jay Rodriguez with Matej Vydra. This is the second substitution made today by Sean Dyche.
In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 83, Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Burnley, close to Brighton's area.
Throw-in for Brighton at Turf Moor.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Brighton are caught offside.
In the minute 85, Phil Bardsley (Burnley) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Burnley is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jon Moss awards the home team a throw-in.
Jon Moss signals a Burnley throw-in in Brighton's half.
In the minute 88, Robbie Brady of Burnley gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Brighton at Turf Moor.
Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 89, Graham Potter is making the team's fourth substitution at Turf Moor with Glenn Murray replacing Aaron Connolly.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Burnley.
Burnley push upfield but Jon Moss quickly pulls them for offside.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Burnley's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Brighton just outside Burnley's area.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
That's full-time at Turf Moor. The final score is 1-2.
Brighton make their fifth substitution with Alireza Jahanbakhsh replacing Neal Maupay.
Erik Pieters (Burnley) gets a yellow card.
